meanings.sent1: The bighead always talks about how great they are.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a bighead and think you're better than everyone else.
meanings.sent3: The bighead thought they were the best at everything, but no one else agreed.
meanings.sent4: Her bighead attitude made it hard for others to work with her.
meanings.sent5: The bighead's ego was so inflated, it blocked out any compliments.

meanings.sent1: The baby had a bighead compared to the rest of its body.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't find a hat that fit his bighead comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The bighead of the statue made it look comically disproportionate.
meanings.sent4: Her bighead seemed to weigh her down as she tried to balance.
meanings.sent5: The bighead of the dinosaur skull was an impressive sight at the museum.

meanings.definition: A disease of fish caused by a parasite.
meanings.sent1: The fish in the tank were affected by bighead.
meanings.sent2: The bighead outbreak devastated the local fish population.
meanings.sent3: The bighead parasite caused chaos in the aquarium.
meanings.sent4: The bighead infection spread quickly among the fish.
meanings.sent5: The bighead disease was a major concern for the fish farmers.
